description: Defines the ReminderSchedule entity class representing automated reminder schedule configurations in the system; includes fields for partner association, notification channel, trigger type, timing, template, and activity status.

classes.name: ReminderSchedule
classes.description: Entity class mapping to the reminder_schedules database table, encapsulating data related to automated reminder schedules.

methods.name: ReminderSchedule
methods.description: Default constructor for the ReminderSchedule class.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the reminder schedule.

methods.name: getPartner
methods.description: Retrieves the associated Partner entity.

methods.name: setPartner
methods.description: Sets the Partner entity for this reminder schedule.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the reminder schedule.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the reminder schedule.

methods.name: getChannel
methods.description: Returns the notification channel (e.g., EMAIL, SMS).

methods.name: setChannel
methods.description: Sets the notification channel.

methods.name: getTriggerType
methods.description: Returns the trigger type (e.g., BEFORE_DUE, AFTER_DUE).

methods.name: setTriggerType
methods.description: Sets the trigger type.

methods.name: getTriggerDays
methods.description: Retrieves the number of days before or after the trigger event.

methods.name: setTriggerDays
methods.description: Sets the number of trigger days.

methods.name: getTemplate
methods.description: Retrieves the associated Template entity.

methods.name: setTemplate
methods.description: Associates a Template with the reminder schedule.

methods.name: getActive
methods.description: Returns whether the schedule is active.

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Sets the activity status of the schedule.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the schedule was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the schedule was last updated.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last updated timestamp.
